name: Donut Kitty Cats Tower Stack 3D
description:
Do you love kitty cats tasty donuts? Do you like adventure 3D tower-building style puzzle games? We have all in one application! We dare you to show us that you have the skill to stack the rectangular prisms exactly on top of one another. We have designed the best tower block stacking game to get you addicted. Be careful! While watching how high you can stack your kitty cat donut tower blocks, the pieces of the tower might fall down if you don’t set them up perfectly.
This ascending block activity features block units which you must skillfully place on top of one another as they drop. Donut Kitty Cats Tower Stack – 3D Donuts Maker is a fast-paced and challenging block stacking game to exercise your reaction to speed and balance. Do not forget that if you do not stack the blocks perfectly while building up your tower, it will lose its balance and will fall! The higher you build, the faster you will receive pieces of the tower.
Donut Kitty Cats Tower Stack – 3D Donuts Maker is a reflex-based construction puzzle where you must react quickly to position the falling blocks to your advantage. Enjoy the cute kitty cat donut tower and our amazing game music with the cat meow sound! Meowth all!!! If you like to cook and decorate cakes or muffins, you will enjoy creating this donut tower with chocolates and icing.
How to play;
• Use good hand-eye coordination and sharp visual skills
• Tap on each 3D block prisms to place them carefully on your tower
• The straighter you stack the blocks, the higher you build up!
• Enjoy our beautiful graphics and nice music on your way to reach the sky!
• Build the highest tower and top the leaderboard
If you like our app, please rate and comment to help us improve!
You can download a version without ads.
